alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Palm Beach County through 430 PM EDT... At 339 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a funnel cloud along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of North County Airport to 11 miles east of Okeelanta. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Tequesta, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Golden Lakes, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, Lake Belvedere Estates, The Acreage, Royal Palm Estates, Loxahatchee NWR, Philo Farms, Aberdeen, Plantation Mobile Home Park, Aberdeen Golf Course and Limestone Creek. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
